document_data.mainbody:
he Full Blood was a ceremony held by worshipers of Garagos that initiated a novice into the priesthood.
This religious ceremony could only take place during a Blood Festival. The supplicants hands were dipped in blood and the symbol of Garagos was painted on their cheeks. The blood used during the ceremony was that of a dangerous creature slain by the supplicant without the aid of others.
